explanation: [0-0] In a kitchen, a man with a beard wearing a black long-sleeved T-shirt is standing. He is holding a white plate in his left hand, on which there are golden pancakes and white onions. In his right hand, he is holding a silver spatula, which is placed in a pot full of ribs in front of him. There is a piece of rib on the spatula. In front of the pot, there is a white rectangular container filled with rice, and a silver spoon is placed in the container. Behind the man are some neatly arranged kitchenware and tableware.

[0-3] As the camera turns, the man scoops the steaming ribs out of the pot with a spatula, and swings them up and down to let the soup on the ribs drip into the pot. The camera zooms in to see the man putting the ribs on the golden pancake and quickly pulls out the spatula.
